application.doc: Retrieving a list of all authorization server instances

method.name: GET
method.doc: To list all of the authorization server instances that are currently configured on the appliance using the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the authorization server resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

representation.name: listAllPdacldInstancesJsonResponse
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: started
param.doc: Whether this instance is started. Valid values are "yes" and "no".

param.name: version
param.doc: The current version of the instance .conf file. This is the last modified time of the file. A numerical number that indicates the number of seconds since the Epoch (00:00:00 UTC, January 1, 1970)

param.name: restart
param.doc: Indicates (yes/no)whether this instance needs to be restarted to allow configuration changes to go into effect.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
